product.name: CoverGirl Ready, Set Gorgeous Liquid Makeup 105
product.description: CoverGirl Ready, Set Gorgeous foundation provides a flawless, natural look that lasts all day in one simple step!Features:Blends easily to even skin tone for a flawless lookShine free look lasts all dayOil free, won't clog poresApplication Tips: Dot foundation on forehead, cheeks and chin. Blend using fingertips or a makeup sponge. Use with any COVERGIRL Pressed Powder to help your look last.
